its size in its various educational, religious and recreational facilities, which, in turn, carries these advantages to the people of the section surrounding the city, it isa distinct advantage to have these facilities located in a convenient center and Tomah’s pr»»vident planning and foresight has made these desirable community facilities available to all Make Tomah your “Home Town” for the helpfulness are c>pen to everyone who seeks the peace and spiritual safety which is brought through the m edium of religion Visit Tom ah’s churches, w here there is a-cordial w elcom e and a warm
